original: HÄGGSTRÖM, Carl Zacharias, Disponent, Uppsala, f Sthlm 14/4 84 av boktr o bokförl I H o Hulda Söderberg, gm Anna Ekwall. Studex, fackstudier i Tyskl, Engl o Norge. Faktor h Ivar Hseggströms Boktr & Bokförl.AB 06, förste faktor där 08, disp Almqvist & Wiksells Boktr AB 10, vkst dir där 23, vkst dir h Ivar Hseggströms Boktr & Bokförl.AB sed. 23 o Hugo Gebers Förlag AB sed. 38. Stdsflm Upps. Ordf Sv Boktr.frn, Sv:es Tryckeriers Arb.giv.frb o Centralstyr f Upl ensk bk, v. ordf Hdlskam Gävle, Sv:es Graf Ind.frb o Ups Sparv AB, styr.led Sv Arb.giv.frn. Av trycket: Huvudsakl skrifter saml i en hylln.-volym »Yrke o yrkesstolthet», utg av vänner o koll bl Sv:es boktr t 50-årsdagen. I övrigt div art i in- och utl facktidskr. KVO2kl, Off TjslVLO, LGAA. Hobby: Jakt.
translated: HÄGGSTRÖM, Carl Zacharias, Manager, Uppsala, b Stockholm 14/4 84, son of a book printer and publisher I H and Hulda Söderberg, married to Anna Ekwall. Graduated, specialized studies in German, English, and Norway. Factor at Ivar Hseggström's Book Printing & Publishing Co. Ltd. since 1906, promoted to senior factor in 1908, manager at Almqvist & Wiksell's Book Printing Co. Ltd. in 1910, promoted to director of growth there in 1923, director of growth at Ivar Hseggström's Book Printing & Publishing Co. Ltd. since 1923, and at Hugo Gebers Publishing Co. Ltd. since 1938. Studying in Uppsala. Chairman of the Swedish Book Printers' Association, the Swedish Printing Employers' Association, and the Central Board of the Uppsala Trade Union for Bookprinting, vice chairman of the Gävle Chamber of Commerce, the Swedish Graphic Industry Association, and Upsala Sparv Corporation, board member of the Swedish Employers' Association. Published: Mainly writings collected in a book titled "Profession and Professional Pride," published by friends and colleagues of Swedish book printers on their 50th anniversary. Various articles in national and international professional journals. Commander of the Royal Order of Vasa, Officer of the Order of the Lion of Finland, member of the Royal Skyttean Society. Hobby: Hunting.
